Paragraph: Whether your site was designed by us or not, benefit from flawless WordPress maintenance. Our unique WordPress maintenance plan suits everyone, whether you are a craftsman, independent or business, offering quality maintenance at a price that respects your budget. Benefit from a high-performance and secure website, allowing you to concentrate fully on the development of your activities.
title: What does our WordPress Maintenance include?
subTitle: Don't leave your WordPress site unattended. Opt for our maintenance and ensure the performance, security and sustainability of your site.

Maintanence.description: Continuous updates : Make sure your site is always up to date with the latest version of WordPress, themes and plugins, avoiding any malfunctions.
Regular backups : Protect your data with complete backups of your site, including source files, database, images and media.
Enhanced security : Prevent attacks with regular updates and the installation of a specific security plugin.
Increased performance : A well-maintained site means a faster, better referenced and more compatible site.
Direct technical support : When faced with a bug or crash, our team is your first resort for a quick and efficient resolution.
Broken link repair : Avoid negative impacts on your SEO and user experience with our broken link detection and repair tool.
